sentences.sentence: Objective To observe the influence of different doses of astragalus in cats.
sentences.translation: 目的观察不同剂量的黄芪对猫正常血压的影响。

sentences.sentence: Scientists say astragalus boosts the immune system, but it isn't known if that translates to any health benefit.
sentences.translation: 科学家们说，黄耆能够改善人体的免疫系统，但还不清楚是否能够给人体健康带来好处。

sentences.sentence: One of the few Western studies on the immune-boosting properties of astragalus was published in 2007, using 16 human subjects.
sentences.translation: 在西方对黄耆提高免疫能力特性为数不多的研究当中，有一项2007年公布的研究，这是一个有16人参加的人体试验。
